MIDIAccess.summary: The MIDIAccess interface of the Web MIDI API provides methods for listing MIDI input and output devices, and obtaining access to those devices.

MIDIAccessInputs.summary: The inputs read-only property of the interface provides access to any available MIDI input ports.

MIDIAccessOutputs.summary: The outputs read-only property of the interface provides access to any available MIDI output ports.

MIDIAccessStatechange.summary: The statechange event of the interface is fired when a new MIDI port is added or when an existing port changes state.

MIDIAccessSysexEnabled.summary: The sysexEnabled read-only property of the interface indicates whether system exclusive support is enabled on the current MIDIAccess instance.
